New Records: Aaron Boone achieved his 500th win as a manager.
Key Match Events: Ceddanne Rafaela homered to left in the 1st inning.
Estevan Florial singled to center in the 5th inning, scoring Everson Pereira.
Jake Bauers grounded into a fielder's choice in the 6th inning, scoring Gleyber Torres.
Gleyber Torres singled to left in the 9th inning, scoring Oswaldo Cabrera.
Austin Wells reached first base on catcher's interference in the 9th inning, allowing Everson Pereira to score.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees swept a doubleheader at Fenway Park for the first time since 2006.
The game had an attendance of 30,392 and lasted 3 hours and 39 minutes.
